author: GameSpot
description:
So many games to be excited for: Pragmata, The Duskbloods, Grand Theft Auto VI, Onimusha Way of the Sword, Marvel's Wolverine, and more!

#bestgameplay #bestgames #gamespot #gameoftheyear
title: 2026 Games That We Are EXCITED For!

author: GameSpot
description:
From GTA 6 to 007: First Light, here are the games the GameSpot team can't wait to play in 2026.

title: Most Anticipated Games of 2026

author: GameSpot
description:
This week Kurt and Lucy gotcha covered with the biggest gaming tech news to come out of CES, concerns over the future of hardware this year, Anthem's closure, and more.

Email your letters to gotchacovered@gamespot.com

Check out the audio version:
Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/show/4S5mfmLES0ubhj5xcDZJni
RSS Feed: https://www.spreaker.com/show/6752166/episodes/feed

Timestamps: 
00:00 - Intro
01:03 - CES News
07:13 - RTX 3060 May Be Returning
13:15 - Anthem Shutting Down
18:24 - Kurt's Dragon's Lair Challenge
30:35 - In-Game Mysteries
37:01 - In memoriam to those we lost
39:29 - Pairing Video Games and Albums
46:29 - Pledge Games of 2026
title: What's Old Is New Again | Kurt & Lucy Gotcha Covered

author: GameSpot
description:
Sony has filed a patent document that could potentially allow AI to take over your game for you if you're struggling with it.

#gamespot #gamenews #sony
title: PlayStation AI Patent Enabling Games To Play Themselves

author: GameSpot
description:
It's the start of the new year, so what better time to make some big and bold predictions about what 2026 will bring for us gamers. From the Steam Machine and GTA6 releases to the use of AI and component parts, there's plenty for Tam and Lucy to get through.

#gta6 #gamespot #steammachine
title: From AI to GTA 6, Here Are Our 2026 Gaming Predictions
